intro.speaker: Basilio
intro.line: Hurry! There should be carriages waiting just through the ravine!

intro.speaker: Basilio
intro.line: Quickly! We're almost... Huh? Damn!  Plegians! I knew it couldn't be that easy... They're right in our way! We must fight!

intro.speaker: Mustafa
intro.line: Ylisseans! I offer you mercy! Surrender to me now and live!

intro.speaker: Basilio
intro.line: Surrender? Sorry, I'm not familiar with the word.

intro.speaker: Mustafa
intro.line: Emmeryn would not have wished for this to come to bloodshed.

intro.speaker: Mustafa
intro.line: Your rage is justified, Prince Chrom. But the meaning of your sister's final sacrifice was not lost on me. I suspect many Plegians who heard her final words would say the same. If you lay down your weapons, I vow to protect you as best I can.

intro.speaker: Frederick
intro.line: How can we trust you after what your barbarous king has done? I think we shall take our chances with weapons in hand!

intro.speaker: Mustafa
intro.line: I suspected you would say as much. So be it, Prince Chrom. I shall endeavor to grant you a swift and dignified end.

battle.speaker: Mustafa
battle.line: What are those--thieves I see scattered about? So, they found our battlefield... They comb it for trinkets and spoils, then scurry away like mice. Pah! We shall bring them to justice later. First, the Ylisseans!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Forgive me sir, but I...I no longer see the justice in hunting these people down. I accept any punishment you see fit, but after all that's happened...I just can't.

battle.speaker: Wyvern Rider
battle.line: How dare you question the general's orders! You know full well the punishment of insubordination is death!

battle.speaker: Mustafa
battle.line: These questions are not ours to ponder, lad. The soldier does not judge. The soldier delivers judgment.

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Sir, I... I cannot raise my lance against them. Even if... Even if it means death.

battle.speaker: Mustafa
battle.line: ...You were there when Emmeryn spoke, weren't you? So be it! Those of you unwilling to fight are dismissed!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: But I don't wish to abandon you, sir!

battle.speaker: Mustafa
battle.line: I cannot defy the king, lad. I know him well. He would murder my wife and child to set an example. I will accept the blame for your actions today. Now go!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: W-wait, General! I see a cause worth fighting for, one I believe in: loyalty to my general.

battle.speaker: Mustafa
battle.line: Call in the reinforcements! Draw them close, then strike!

boss.speaker: Mustafa
boss.line: I am General Mustafa of Plegia. If you wish to keep your lives, then you must win them!

boss.speaker: Mustafa
boss.line: Well done, Ylisseans... Hrrggh! Please...spare my men...

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: Khan Basilio!

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Olivia! I'm sorry we kept you waiting.

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: When I didn't hear from you, I thought... I assumed the worst.

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Chrom? Robin? Meet Olivia. She'll be smuggling us out of here.

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: Only if you hurry! Doubtless more of the Mad King's men are on their way.

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Right. Pile in, you lot! And bid farewell to this Plegian hellhole.

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: Ready? Hold on tight!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: All that... For nothing...

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: *Sob* *sniff* Emm... Oh, Emm...

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: I should have died before allowing the exalt to be captured. I have failed as a knight...

end.speaker: Flavia
end.line: So what now, oaf?

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Don't look to me—I'm not in charge!

end.speaker: Flavia
end.line: Ugh... I picked a fine time to regain the full throne...

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Chrom, I'm... I'm so sorry. My plan just wasn't enough.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: You did your best, Robin. ...You have my thanks. It's my own failures that haunt me now. Gods, I was just so powerless!

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: It's not your fault either, Chrom.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: ...She did it for me, Robin. So that I wouldn't have to live with the guilt of either choice, she chose for me. She sacrificed herself rather than give up what could one day save her people...

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: Chrom... Listen to me. Look at me.

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: I was powerless once, too, remember? And yes, alone, I don't think either one of us is half the person your sister was. But together...maybe we can be something more. If you fall, I'll be there to pull you back up. When you fight for your sister's ideals, I'll be by your side. You don't have to become your sister, you know. You can still be true to yourself. You just have to give people hope in whatever way you can.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: And what if I can't? What if I'm not worthy of her ideals? Robin, what if I drag you down with me?

end.speaker: Robin
end.line: If you aren't worthy, you'll keep at it until you are. And if we both fall down, well, that's what friends are for, isn't it?

end.speaker: Nowi
end.line: That's right. I wouldn't be even here if not for you.

end.speaker: Tharja
end.line: You gave me your trust and now you have mine. ...For the time being.

end.speaker: Lon'Qu
end.line: Were you unworthy, I would have left long ago.

end.speaker: Virion
end.line: It took great courage and charisma to unite all of us. ...I knew I possessed such talents, but clearly you do as well!

end.speaker: Ricken
end.line: Yeah. We all look up to you! You're like a hero to us.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Thank you, everyone. Your words mean more than you could know. My Shepherds... My warriors... There is work to be done. Gangrel must be stopped so that peace can once again reign in Ylisse. Will you help me?

end.speaker: Lissa
end.line: You can count me in! I'm tired of crying all the time! It's time to start punchin' stuff!

end.speaker: Maribelle
end.line: Hear, hear, darling! Our people have suffered enough.

end.speaker: Stahl
end.line: Gladly would I fight and die for House Ylisse!

end.speaker: Sully
end.line: Gladly would I fight and KILL those dastards for House Ylisse!

end.speaker: Libra
end.line: Our hearts echo yours, sire.

end.speaker: Sumia
end.line: I will be the the unbreakable shield by your side!

end.speaker: Kellam
end.line: I'm with you, too! You know. Just in case anyone...Hello?

end.speaker: Vaike
end.line: Teach is here and class is in session!

end.speaker: Gregor
end.line: How much you pay Gregor? Hee hee haw! Gregor make joke! ...Why you look at Gregor like that?

end.speaker: Panne
end.line: Your sister earned my respect. The last taguel shall champion her.

end.speaker: Frederick
end.line: You have grown strong, milord. I may have set a poor example as a knight... but I swear to you, I shall die before any more exalted blood is spilled!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: ...Thank you all. Truly. You honor me with your fealty. I will not falter again. We shall answer this outrage! The Mad King must be stopped!

end.speaker: Flavia
end.line: Right! It's time for ol' Gangrel to get a dose of his own vulnerary! The whole of the Feroxi army is yours to send crashing against him!

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Har! You young folk—your passions run so hot! If I had any gray hairs, you would've singed 'em right off. In other words, count me in!

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: I'd like to go too, if I may. The exalt did me a kindness once.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: She did?

end.speaker: Olivia
end.line: Y-yes, sire. It would honor me to have a part in giving her justice! Although all I can do is dance... And I'm not so skilled at that, if we're being honest...

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Har har! She's too modest! Olivia is a Feroxi treasure. You won't meet a finer dancer in all the realms! Her moves inspire soldiers to work twice as hard! You'll do well to bring her along, Commander.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: "Commander"? What happened to "boy"?

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: You've earned your way up from that name, I think. Now, where were we? Oh yes! I was just about to start cracking skulls! Flavia will lead me and the other Feroxi in a head-on assault. That should buy you enough time to take down Gangrel. Hear that, boy! You get the fun part!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: I thought you weren't going to call me--

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: You and Robin have my every confidence. You're a born leader, and he/she has a knack of guiding troops to victory. You both have some growing to do yet, but I can already see you'll grow tall.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Thanks, Basilio.

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: All right, enough talk. It's time to raise some hell!

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Right.

end.speaker: Basilio
end.line: Let's get to it, then! Gangrel may try to hit us while we're still licking our wounds.

end.speaker: Chrom
end.line: Let him try. This time, I'm ready to dethrone the Mad King, once and for all.
